item.title: [SPARK-30440] Flaky test: org.apache.spark.scheduler.TaskSetManagerSuite.reset
item.description:
https://amplab.cs.berkeley.edu/jenkins/job/SparkPullRequestBuilder/116126/testReport

https://amplab.cs.berkeley.edu/jenkins/job/SparkPullRequestBuilder/116159/testReport/

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: cc. Ngone51 since the failing test is added from SPARK-30359
kabhwan thanks for reporting it. Let me take a look.

Found a race between reviveOffers in org.apache.spark.scheduler.TaskSchedulerImpl#submitTasks and org.apache.spark.scheduler.TaskSetManager#resourceOffer, in the testcase made PR for same

https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/27115

Issue resolved by pull request 27115
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/27115
